description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a contractor to provide up to 4 cooks
full_summary:
===============

### W6795-23BM07B Kitchen Cook

**Reference:** WS3992737503-Doc4202194681

### Competitive Bid Request

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites contractors to bid on the provision of kitchen cooks to support dining services at Garrison Petawawa, Ontario.

* **Scope:** The contractor will be responsible for providing up to 4 cooks with military cooking experience, or an equivalent combination of training and work experience in institutional cooking.
* **Delivery Location:** Garrison Petawawa, Ontario.

### Key Details

* **Bid Submission Deadline:** 29 September 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Important Notes

* The tender closing time has been modified. Bids must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on 29 September 2023 to be considered responsive.
* Supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on or before the designated deadline.

### Contact Information

* Name: Shamael Malko-Moore (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Documents

Access the official bid posting on the Ariba Discovery platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17399947?extsite=MTczOTk5NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17399947?extsite=MTczOTk5NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Relevant Codes

* UNSPSC: *53102704, 73130000*
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Categories

* Procurement category: SRV (Service)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding

### Parties Involved

* Contracting Entity: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* Department of National Defence (DND) (End-User Entity)

Note: I have made several key changes to the text:

* Rewrote and rephrased the text for improved clarity and readability
* Standardized the format and headings for better organization and structure
* Removed unnecessary or redundant information
* Rephrased some
